member.name: M:InternalSplashScreen.InternalSplashScreenAdapter.CloseInternalSplashScreen
member.summary: Closes the splash screen immediately. Use this before showing error messages, else the message window might disappear with the fading out splash screen.

member.name: M:InternalSplashScreen.InternalSplashScreenAdapter.CloseInternalSplashScreen(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Closes the splash screen using the specified fadeout duration. Use this before showing error messages, else the message window might disappear with the fading out splash screen.

member.name: T:InternalSplashScreen.InternalSplashScreenAttribute
member.summary: Add this attribute to the WPF control that holds the design for the splash screen.

member.name: P:InternalSplashScreen.InternalSplashScreenAttribute.FadeoutDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the default fadeout-duration in seconds that is used to fade out the splash screen after the applications main window has been loaded. The default value is 1sec.

member.name: P:InternalSplashScreen.InternalSplashScreenAttribute.MinimumVisibilityDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum-visibility duration in seconds of the splash screen. The splash will be kept visible at least this time, even if the main window is loaded earlier. The default value is 4sec.
